content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the module Introduction to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.sap.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"www.sap.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" setup in AEM, you will learn the structure of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.sap.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"www.sap.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"line-height\":\"107%\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Calibri\\\",sans-serif\",\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and dive into \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://sap.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"sap.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" AEM. You will get information about AEM structure of the basic page, AEM Campaign, and Microsite (Content Hub) AEM. Also, you will learn how to work with different request types.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To Do:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please read the information \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/SAPDPPA/Introduction+to+www.sap.com+setup+in+AEM\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HERE.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Also review all child pages.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Calibri\\\",sans-serif\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]}]}}"
